help.title: Annotations
help.body: Mark any visible handwritten annotations on the label or backing sheet

annotation.instruction: Draw a rectangle around each *unmarked* annotation.

appellation_present.instruction: Is there appellation (region or country of origin) information present that *has not been marked*?

help.title: Appellation, region, or country of origin
help.body: Select the type of appellation, then draw a rectangle around each appellation of that type. Mark both the ocean region or whaling ground (typically at the top of the page) and any specific positions or geographic references that you see further down on the page.

appellation.instruction: Pick an appellation option. Draw a rectangle around each corresponding text region that *has not been marked*.

help.title: Wine appellation
help.body: This can be any geographic reference, from a wine region to a country of origin.
